get.description: Get service-providers for a rolle by its id.

200.description: Returns a list of service-provider ids.

401.description: Not authorized to retrieve service-providers for rolle.

post.description: Add a service-provider to a rolle by id.

400.description: The service-provider is already attached to rolle.

401.description: Not authorized to retrieve service-providers for rolle.

404.description: The rolle or the service-provider to add does not exist.

delete.description: Remove a service-provider from a rolle by id.

401.description: Not authorized to retrieve service-providers for rolle.

404.description: The rolle or the service-provider that should be removed does not exist.

401.description: Not authorized to get available service providers.

500.description: Internal server error while getting all service-providers.
